resources.string: Booooo, Republicans in this state voted for trump....
Republicans in this state voted for someone else...
Republicans have not voted in this state yet

To search by state name enter text. To search by Asshole density enter a number between 0 and 100. The search will look for states with a density greater than the number you entered. To search by state size in square miles, enter a number greater than 100. The search will look for states that are smaller than that number
I won this state! I am crazy mother fucker too! Time to drop out!
